name: 東方苦粗芸物語 Touhou KSG Story
description: in Japanese language only yet. "Overview" This game is a fan game of Touhou fan movie. The setting etc differs from what is called Touhou series of Shanghai Alice. It is an omnibus by several genres such as action, shooting, puzzle, sports.
